characters.name: SIIM
characters.description: Väike erk oranž orav, pika koheva sabaga, seljas sinine kootud vest, suured sõbralikud silmad, uudishimulik näoilme. Armas multifilmistiil.

characters.name: MIIA
characters.description: Väike hall hiir suurte ümarate kõrvadega, seljas roheline kootud kleit, väiksed roosad käpad, õrn ja rõõmsameelne näoilme. Armas multifilmistiil.

locations.name: SIIM JA MIIA TUBA
locations.description: Cozy children's room with light yellow walls, wooden floor, a single small window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table is in the center, surrounded by two small wooden chairs. A simple wooden shelf with a few books is on the left wall. Warm, soft light fills the room. Cartoon style.

locations.name: AED LUMEGA
locations.description: Peaceful winter garden covered in fresh, white snow. Tall green pine trees with snow on branches in the background. A few bare deciduous trees in the midground. The ground is a smooth blanket of snow. Bright, clear winter daylight. Cartoon style.

pages.scene: Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse sit at a small wooden table in their cozy room. Siim looks thoughtfully out the window, and Miia rests her chin on her hand, looking contemplative. Warm sunlight streams from the window. The room has light yellow walls, a wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees, and a wooden shelf on the left wall. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse are looking out the window in their cozy room. Outside, snowy trees are visible. Miia shivers slightly, and Siim points towards the snowy view, both with gentle, concerned expressions. The room has light yellow walls, a wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees, and a wooden shelf on the left wall. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse are still at the wooden table in their room, now looking at each other with determined, kind expressions. Siim gestures with a paw as if suggesting an idea, and Miia nods in agreement. The room has light yellow walls, a wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees, and a wooden shelf on the left wall. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse are actively making a bird feeder (pesakast) at the wooden table. Siim holds a small piece of wood, and Miia carefully glues another part with a tiny bottle of glue. Simple wooden pieces and tools are on the table. Both look focused and happy. The room has light yellow walls, a wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees, and a wooden shelf on the left wall. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse stand at the wooden table. They have finished making a small, simple wooden bird feeder (pesakast). Miia carefully pours small bird seeds from a colorful pouch into the feeder, while Siim watches intently, smiling. The room has light yellow walls, a wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees, and a wooden shelf on the left wall. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse are bundled up in tiny scarves and mittens, standing at the opened door of their house, which leads into a snowy garden. They are about to step out, looking excited. Siim holds the finished bird feeder (pesakast) gently. The garden is covered in fresh, white snow with pine trees in the background. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse are in the peaceful winter garden covered in snow. They are carefully hanging the simple wooden bird feeder (pesakast) on a branch of a bare deciduous tree. Siim reaches up to the branch, and Miia steadies the feeder from below. Snow covers the ground and pine trees are in the background. Bright, clear winter daylight. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse stand a little distance from the tree in the snowy garden, pointing excitedly. Several small, colorful birds are flying towards the newly hung bird feeder (pesakast) on the tree. Snow covers the ground and pine trees are in the background. Bright, clear winter daylight. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse are observing from a small distance in the snowy garden, smiling happily. A few small, colorful birds are now happily perched on and inside the bird feeder (pesakast) on the tree, pecking at the seeds. Snow covers the ground and pine trees are in the background. Bright, clear winter daylight. Cartoon style.

Siim the squirrel and Miia the mouse are standing together in the peaceful snowy garden, looking at the bird feeder and the happy birds (visible in the distance). They are smiling broadly and holding paws, filled with satisfaction. Snow covers the ground and pine trees are in the background. Bright, clear winter daylight. Cartoon style.
